content.question: An advantage that bureaucrats in federal government have over the President in the policymaking process is that bureaucrats

choices.label: have an independence from the President that is guaranteed by the Constitution
find it easier to marshall public support than does the President
usually have a continuity of service in the executive branch that the President lacks
have better access to the media than does the President

content.answer: usually have a continuity of service in the executive branch that the President lacks
